author: Tony Tobin
method: Place all of the ingredients into a bowl, stri well and serve.
ingredients: 2 slices pineapple from a can, chopped,  ½ lime, juice only,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ¼ red chilli, finely chopped,  ½ ready-cooked chicken breast, chopped,  handful of mixed fresh herbs e.g. mint, basil, coriander and parsley
